entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as 'You-Know-Who' by the characters. (Excerpt: "telling Voldemort you could hand him the Potters.")

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: A character who is suspected of working for Voldemort and has a maimed hand. (Excerpt: "Pettigrew was muttering distractedly; Harry caught words like “far-fetched” and “lunacy,” but he couldn’t help paying more attention to the ashen color of Pettigrew’s face")

entities.name: potters
entities.description: A family that is mentioned as being in danger from Voldemort. (Excerpt: "telling Voldemort you could hand him the Potters.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A professor who is addressed by Hermione and has a relationship with Pettigrew. (Excerpt: "Professor Lupin?" said Hermione timidly.)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student who asks Professor Lupin a question about Scabbers/Pettigrew. (Excerpt: "Well — Scabbers — I mean, this — this man — he’s been sleeping in Harry’s dormitory for three years.")

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Pettigrew's pet rat that is suspected of being an Animagus. (Excerpt: "Well — Scabbers — I mean, this — this man — he’s been sleeping in Harry’s dormitory for three years.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A student who is pointed at by Pettigrew. (Excerpt: "There!" said Pettigrew shrilly, pointing at Ron with his maimed hand.)

entities.name: black
entities.description: A character who makes a statement about Pettigrew's motivations. (Excerpt: "I’ll tell you why," said Black.” Because you never did anything for anyone unless you could see what was in it for you.)

relationships.description: Pettigrew is suspected of working for Voldemort. (Excerpt: "If he’s working for You-Know-Who, how come he never tried to hurt Harry before now?")
